snippets.name: Voice: Start HigherSelf Server
snippets.description: Start the HigherSelf Network Server via voice command
snippets.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "ğŸ“ Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "â° $(date)"
echo ""

# Load environment variables
if [ -f .env ]; then
    source .env
    echo "âœ… Environment variables loaded"
else
    echo "âš ï¸  Warning: .env file not found"
fi

# Start the server based on environment
if [ "${ENVIRONMENT:-development}" = "production" ]; then
    echo "ğŸš€ Starting production server..."
    docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
elif [ "${ENVIRONMENT:-development}" = "staging" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ§ª Starting staging server..."
    docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.staging.yml up -d
else
    echo "ğŸ› ï¸  Starting development server..."
    docker-compose up -d
fi

# Wait for services to start

sleep 5

# Check service status

docker-compose ps

# Health check

echo "âœ… Server startup complete!"
echo "ğŸŒ API: http://localhost:8000"
echo "ğŸ“Š Grafana: http://localhost:3000"
echo "ğŸ“ˆ Prometheus: http://localhost:9090"

snippets.name: Voice: Check Server Status
snippets.description: Check the status of HigherSelf Network Server via voice command
snippets.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "ğŸ¤ Voice Command: Checking HigherSelf Network Server Status..."
echo "ğŸ“ Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "â° $(date)"
echo ""

# Check Docker status
echo "ğŸ³ Docker Status:"
docker --version
docker-compose --version
echo ""

# Check service status
echo "ğŸ“Š Service Status:"
docker-compose ps
echo ""

# Check system resources
echo "ğŸ’» System Resources:"
echo "CPU Usage:"
top -l 1 | grep "CPU usage" || echo "CPU info not available"
echo "Memory Usage:"
free -h 2>/dev/null || vm_stat | head -5
echo "Disk Usage:"
df -h | grep -E '(Filesystem|/dev/)'
echo ""

# Health checks
echo "ğŸ¥ Health Checks:"
echo "API Health:"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq . || echo "âŒ API not responding"
echo ""
echo "Redis Health:"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/redis | jq . || echo "âŒ Redis health check failed"
echo ""
echo "MongoDB Health:"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/mongodb | jq . || echo "âŒ MongoDB health check failed"

echo ""
echo "ğŸ“ˆ Quick Access URLs:"
echo "ğŸŒ API: http://localhost:8000"
echo "ğŸ“Š Grafana: http://localhost:3000"
echo "ğŸ“ˆ Prometheus: http://localhost:9090"

snippets.name: Voice: Deploy Server
snippets.description: Deploy HigherSelf Network Server via voice command
snippets.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "ğŸ¤ Voice Command: Deploying HigherSelf Network Server..."
echo "ğŸ“ Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "â° $(date)"
echo ""

# Confirmation for production deployment
if [ "${ENVIRONMENT}" = "production" ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  PRODUCTION DEPLOYMENT DETECTED!"
    echo "This will deploy to the live production environment."
    read -p "Are you sure you want to continue? (yes/no): " confirm
    if [ "$confirm" != "yes" ]; then
        echo "âŒ Deployment cancelled"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# Run deployment script based on environment
if [ "${ENVIRONMENT}" = "production" ]; then
    echo "ğŸš€ Running production deployment..."
    ./deploy-the7space-production.sh
elif [ "${ENVIRONMENT}" = "staging" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ§ª Running staging deployment..."
    ./scripts/deploy.sh --env staging --build
else
    echo "ğŸ› ï¸  Running development deployment..."
    ./scripts/deploy.sh --env dev --build
fi

echo ""
echo "âœ… Deployment complete!"
echo "ğŸ” Run 'voice-server-status' to verify deployment"

snippets.name: Voice: Build Server Images
snippets.description: Build HigherSelf Network Server Docker images via voice command
snippets.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "ğŸ¤ Voice Command: Building HigherSelf Network Server Images..."
echo "ğŸ“ Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "â° $(date)"
echo ""

# Clean up old images if requested
read -p "Clean up old images first? (y/n): " cleanup
if [ "$cleanup" = "y" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up old images..."
    docker system prune -f
    docker-compose down --rmi all
fi

# Build images
echo "ğŸ”¨ Building Docker images..."
docker-compose build --no-cache

# Verify build
echo ""
echo "ğŸ” Verifying built images:"
docker images | grep higherself

echo ""
echo "âœ… Build complete!"
echo "ğŸš€ Use 'voice-server-start' to start with new images"
